    Rik

      • Core

      • Core

        public Core(java.lang.String host,
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> ports,
    java.lang.String dbName,
    java.lang.String userName,
    java.lang.String password)
        Create instance with configuration given by arguments.
        Parameters:
        host - - URL to MongoDB replica set.
        ports - - Ports of MongoDB replica set.
        userName - - Username of user.
        password - - Corresponding password of user.
        dbName - - Database the user want to authenticate for.
